tasks.label: Cleanup Servers
tasks.command: pid=$(netstat -ano 2>/dev/null | grep ':4321.*LISTENING' | awk '{print $NF}' | head -1); [ -n "$pid" ] && taskkill //F //PID $pid >/dev/null 2>&1; exit 0

tasks.label: Prepare Debug Environment
tasks.command: npm run dev > /dev/null 2>&1 & for i in $(seq 1 30); do curl -s http://localhost:4321 > /dev/null 2>&1 && exit 0; sleep 1; done; exit 1
